html: I went down to Salisbury To listen to the choir, A pair of Russian tourists They were staring up the spire, Staring up the spire, they were, Silent and aghast, Against the sky, hurtling by, A piggy flying past.
text:
I went down to Salisbury 
To listen to the choir,
A pair of Russian tourists
They were staring up the spire,
Staring up the spire, they were,
Silent and aghast,
Against the sky, hurtling by,
A piggy flying past.

This afternoon saw the official opening of the Fishlake Meadows nature reserve. A wonderful addition to Romsey, now with a path the middle of the reserve.

Teaming with wonderful wildlife, even saw an osprey.pic.twitter.com/FZJZbm0wXt
